nodes.text: Isn't she beautiful in the firelight? Katie, I mean.
I'd rather talk to Aeolus when Katie isn't around.
Hi! I take it that you are here for the Poobah game.
There's nothing I really want to say to him right now.
I am so glad that the midterm exam is finally over, aren't you?
Eh, I'll see him later.
You aren't still mad at me, are you?
Ready for the big game?
We can talk later.
Are you still holding a grudge?
This should be an exciting evening of drama and pathos, don't you think?
We can talk later.
I've never seen anyone so wonderful and mysterious in my life.
I guess I'll see him later.
Shall we get the Poobah game going?
Sure. Maybe I can beat you at this game.
Yes, the game is afoot! It's a shoe thing I'll win!
Would you like to play a game of darts with me?
Sure, I'm really pretty good at the game, actually.
I think you're better at this game than I am... maybe you can teach me.
I've played a lot of dart games - it's something to do as a break from singing in taverns. However, I think you are the best I've ever played.
Ha... and I thought that I was good at this game. Nice one, Shawn.
Either you were very lucky - or you're now better at this game than I am.
I told you I was good at darts.
Would you like to play a game of billiards with me?
I grew up with a billiards table at home, so I'm pretty good at it. So... When it comes to Pool, I'm no Fool... Prepare to Drool!
Whoa... smooth moves and clever plays. You've mastered this game!
It's sad to say, but I've been outplayed... I'll take my cue and bow to you.
You've snookered me in this pool game, you hustler, you. I'm behind the eight-ball.
Told you I was good at billiards.
Would you like to play cards with me?
I'm not very good at cards, but I'll be happy to play a few hands of cribbage with you.
I warned you that I wasn't very good at playing cards.
I clearly need to improve my card skills or I'll never win anything at Poobah.
What do you know? I won. I didn't think that anyone was worse at cards than I am. Thanks!
